attributes.action: EXIT BREXIT and re-join the European Union to reverse the mess we’re in.
attributes.additional_details: To rejoin the European Union by having another vote and giving the correct facts unlike last time. And get Boris out!!
attributes.background: Reverse the mess that Boris and all the other brexiteers have made. Make Traiding with the EU easy once again. Have another vote with the correct facts!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Seek to rejoin the EU Single Market and Customs Union: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596930

Seek to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600832
